name: Hard Charlie
description:
Fill the bike's gastank before the zombies eat you!

This is a game I made mostly to practice pixel-art. Its a prototype with many bugs and unpolished features, but I hope you enjoy it :D

If somebody likes it, maybe I'll continue developing it.

A tip: search dumpsters and trash bins for weapons.


Movement: WASD

Shoot: SPACE or LEFT CLICK

Strafe: ALT

Reload: R

Use: E
